item.description:
Ironing is no longer just a chore! Fabric collage is a fun medium. I will demonstrate how to use iron-on adhesive to create designs both on fabric and paper. You can create greeting cards with card stock I will provide.

WHAT TO BRING: ironing board and iron. Fabric scraps, though I will provide some for sample works. Good pair of scissors. I will supply all other materials.

DAY/TIME: Saturday, June 9th, from 2-5p.m.

AMENITIES: Free parking. Table space and a chair. Access to some tools (paper cutter, heat gun, some aprons, etc.). Access to a fridge, microwave, toaster oven, kitchen sink and restroom.

COST: $15; includes all supplies.

WHO MAY ATTEND: Anyone, but you must sign up on the NE ATC+ Meetup site (which requires joining that group; it's free with no obligation).

HOW TO SIGN UP: These smaller sessions are often full with a waiting list. Reserve a place by RSVP-ing "yes" using Meetup's RSVP function. Please RSVP for your guests as well.

If your plans (or your guests' plans) change, PLEASE update your RSVP accordingly. Please do this right up to the start time of the event.

CANCELLATIONS: In the unlikely event that we need to cancel---or even if we're just getting a late start--we'll post a message on the Web site and e-mail everyone who's RSVP'd "yes." So to be on the safe side, please check the Web site and your inbox before departing for ArtStudio 360.

Questions? E-mail Leah through the Meetup message board.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: ArtStudio360 Workshop: Fabric Collage
